summary: The file contains unit tests that validate the forward computation of the InterCTC loss used in speech recognition models. It includes a minimal deterministic dataset for testing and helper utilities to generate encoder configurations for various model types such as Conformer, Jasper, and Squeezeformer.
business_intent: To guarantee the correctness and stability of the InterCTC loss implementation across different ASR model architectures, supporting reliable model training and deployment in speech recognition applications.
